import React from'react';import{Prism as SyntaxHighlighter}from'react-syntax-highlighter';import{oneLight}from'react-syntax-highlighter/dist/esm/styles/prism';import'./FSHFileViewer.css';/**

const defaultStyle={margin:0,borderRadius:'8px',fontSize:'14px',lineHeight:'1.6',background:'#f8f9fa',border:'1px solid #e9ecef',...customStyle};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`fsh-file-viewer ${className}`,children:[fileName&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"fsh-file-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"file-icon",children:"\uD83D\uDCC4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"file-name",children:fileName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"file-type",children:"FSH"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fsh-syntax-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SyntaxHighlighter,{language:"javascript"// Using javascript as closest match for FSH syntax
